anya-e1001n5:2: Mahājanaṁ yo rañjeti, catūhipi vatthūhi vā;
anya-e1001n5:3: Rājāti vuccate loke, iti sallakkhaye vidvā.
anya-e1001n5:8: Kariyacariyasusaṅgahaṁ bahūnaṁ, anavamatena guṇena yāti saggaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:9: Dānañca peyyavajjañca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
anya-e1001n5:10: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:11: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
anya-e1001n5:13: Dānaṁ sīlaṁ pariccāgaṁ, ajjavaṁ maddavaṁ tapaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:17: Ekayāmaṁ saye rājā, dviyā maññeva paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n5:20: Aputtakaṁ gharaṁ suññaṁ, raṭṭhaṁ suññaṁ arājakaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:27: Dubbalassa balaṁ rājā, kumārānaṁ rudaṁ balaṁ.
anya-e1001n5:30: Nāyakassa guṇā ete, icchitabbā sataṁ sadā.
anya-e1001n5:33: Sakiṁ sappurisā loke, esa dhammo sanantano.
anya-e1001n5:38: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṁ na sādhu.
anya-e1001n5:40: Āyaṁ khayaṁ sayaṁ jaññā, katākataṁ sayaṁ jaññā;
anya-e1001n5:43: Mātā puttakataṁ pāpaṁ, sissakataṁ guru tathā;
anya-e1001n5:46: Akkodhena jine kodhaṁ, asādhuṁ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1001n5:57: Na raññā samakaṁ bhuñje, kāmabhogaṁ kudācanaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:61: Na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti samako;
anya-e1001n5:62: Eso sāmiko mayhanti, citte niṭṭhaṁ saṇṭhāpaye.
anya-e1001n5:65: Ujuke nātininne ca, na bhaje uccamāsane;
anya-e1001n5:66: Cha dose vajje sevako, aggīva saṁyato tiṭṭhe.
anya-e1001n5:67: Na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato;
anya-e1001n5:68: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
anya-e1001n5:69: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṁ ṭhitā ahu –
anya-e1001n5:76: Kassako vāṇijo macco, samaṇo sutasīla vā;
anya-e1001n5:82: Mahārukkhassa phalino, āmaṁ chindati yo phalaṁ;
anya-e1001n5:88: Mahārukkhassa phalino, pakkaṁ chindati yo phalaṁ;
